text: “Au gaa hai goodou ala ne lahi gi daha gi mmaadagu ngoohia gaa llele gi daha i di godou madagoaa ma ga hagalongo gi nia lee o nia lau laagau ala ma ga iliili go di madangi. Goodou gaa llele gadoo be goodou ala ma gaa llele gi daha mo godou hagadaumee i lodo tauwa, gei goodou ga tingatinga gei godou hagadaumee la hagalee i godou baahi.
